index.title: My Brands
index.subtitle: Manage your brands and access their dashboards
index.noBrands: You don't have any brands yet
index.noBrandsDescription: Get started by creating your first brand
index.managedBrandsSubtitle: Brand accounts you have access to
index.clickToSwitch: Click to switch to this account

createBrand.title: Create New Brand
createBrand.description: Set up a new brand with its own workspace and API credentials
createBrand.brandNameHelper: Enter a unique name for your brand
createBrand.successMessage: Your brand has been created with API credentials.
createBrand.credentialsWarning: Save these credentials now - they won't be shown again!
createBrand.signedInWithCredentials: Successfully signed in with brand credentials

credentials.principalDescription: Sign in with your system administrator account
credentials.brandDescription: Sign in with brand API credentials
credentials.brandIdHelp: Enter the Brand ID to add as credential
credentials.brandContextDescription: Add a brand context credential to switch between different brands
credentials.confirmRemoveMessage: Are you sure you want to remove
credentials.confirmClearAllMessage: This will remove all stored credentials. You will need to sign in again.
credentials.storageInfo: Credentials are stored locally in your browser

brandCredentials.info: These are your brand's API credentials for programmatic access.
brandCredentials.resetInfo: API credentials are only shown once when created. You can reset them to get new credentials.
brandCredentials.security: Keep these credentials secure. Do not share them or commit them to version control.
brandCredentials.resetWarning: Resetting credentials will invalidate the current API key and password. Any applications using them will stop working.
brandCredentials.resetSuccess: Credentials have been reset successfully. Save these new credentials - they won't be shown again!

profile.title: User Profile
profile.deleteAccountWarning: Once you delete your account, there is no going back. All your data, including brands and associated information, will be permanently deleted. This action cannot be undone.
profile.deleteSuccess: Your account has been successfully deleted. Redirecting...

deleteDialog.title: Delete Account
deleteDialog.message: This action will permanently delete your account and all associated data. You will lose access to all brands, outlets, and related information. This action cannot be undone.
deleteDialog.passwordHelper: Type your current password to confirm account deletion
deleteDialog.passwordRequired: Password is required to delete your account
